creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: padded lined jacket; vertical red and gold striped; short side vents; neck, front and sleeves have applied metal braid and embroidery; front and sleeve cuffs have green loop and silk bead buttons; inside cuff had flannel lining
dimension:
23 x 21 in. (58.42 x 53.34 cm)
57 1/4 in. (145.42 cm) (object part, cuff to cuff)
title: Jacket
